text: Tara allahâ€Œke chere diye tadera panditaganake o sann'yasidera prabhurupe grahana kareche, ara mariyama-putra masihâ€Œke'o, athaca sudhu eka upasyera upasana kara chara an'ya nirdesa tadera deya haya ni. Tini chara an'ya upasya ne'i. Tamra'i saba mahima -- tara ye- saba ansi damra karara se-saba theke
